pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.about: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

pokemon.name: Chinchou
pokemon.about: It lives in ocean depths beyond the reach of sunlight. It flashes lights on its antennae to communicate with others of its kind.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.about: This legendary Pokémon is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.about: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.about: For some time after its birth, it uses the nutrients that are packed into the seed on its back in order to grow.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.about: Its scientific name is Oddium wanderus. It is said to cover distances as far as 1,000 feet when night falls, walking on its two roots.

pokemon.name: Jumpluff
pokemon.about: Jumpluff travels on seasonal winds. Once its cotton spores run out, its journey ends, as does its life.

pokemon.name: Leafeon
pokemon.about: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.about: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life-force. If Charmander is weak, the flame also burns weakly.

pokemon.name: Entei
pokemon.about: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.

pokemon.name: Chimchar
pokemon.about: It is very agile. Before going to sleep, it extinguishes the flame on its tail to prevent fires.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.about: About an hour after birth, Ponyta’s fiery mane and tail grow out, giving the Pokémon an impressive appearance.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.about: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It sprays a potent foam from its mouth.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.about: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.about: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.about: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.
